issue.title: get it live on the app store
issue.body:
what

*  on the profile page with the tabs, make the lists `account | bounties saved | bounties started` instead of `account | bounties claimed`
* add a bounty to the 'saved' list if its been swiped right
* add it to the started list if it's been started (this already works)

issue.title: As a user, I want push notifications that are more targeted to me.
issue.body:
As a user, I want push notifications that are more targeted to me.

Right now: Just push notifications once a week on Tuesday

Later: Push notifications immediately when new work comes up that matches my profile.  The push notificaiton when clicked on should bring up the card for that bounty direclty

issue.title: enable push notifications when new work is available.
issue.body:
i want to enable push notifications for when new work is available, which are time delayed.

by default, the app could send a push notification 3 hours after new work is available on the network.  

from there, i would like to enable an in-app purchase that gives "instant" notifications for new work, which matches my profile, becoming available.

issue.title: Change swipe right interaction
issue.body:
Change swipe right to view details

Remove red color association to Swipe left action



Add Start Work button on the details view.

issue.title: Remove Heart
issue.body: Remove Heart which represents favoriting

issue.title: Add how to use the app screen
issue.body:
Add clear simple language on how to use the app:
*Change X to Next, Swipe Right to See the next card, Tap to see details and Click start work*

issue.title: See swiped bounties
issue.body: From a user: Hai - was playing with the app, I like the swiping. Any way to see a list of bounties I have swiped?
